sentences.en: According to Buckley, the more correct question is "Why are there more visible nucleons than anti-nucleons?"
sentences.cn: 而Buckley说，更准确的提问应该是”为什么可见的核子多于反核子？

sentences.en: They are immune to the nuclear force that strongly influences nucleons .
sentences.cn: 强烈影响核子的核力对电子是没有作用的。

sentences.en: To study on nucleons is not only an immortal subject in physics, but in geoscience and other nature sciences.
sentences.cn: 对核子的研究不仅是物理学，也是地学及其它自然科学的一个主题。
